description: This file defines a service object 'pathsService' that provides methods to interact with learning paths-related API endpoints. It includes functions to list all learning paths, retrieve details for a specific path, and get courses for a specific path, utilizing an external apiJson method for HTTP requests.

methods.name: list()
methods.description: Fetches an array of learning paths from the API endpoint '/api/learning-paths'.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves details for a specific learning path by ID from the API endpoint '/api/learning-paths/:id'. Throws an error if ID is not provided.

methods.name: getCourses
methods.description: Fetches courses associated with a specific learning path ID from the endpoint '/api/learning-paths/:id/courses'. Throws an error if ID is not provided.

ctags.name: err
ctags.pattern: /^      const err = new Error("Path id required");$/
